## ProgressPromise.progress() method

Adds a progress callback who listen to progress evolution of the `ProgressPromise`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
progress(onprogress?: (progress: P) => void): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  onprogress | (progress: P) =&gt; void | The callback to execute when the ProgressPromise progress changed. |

<b>Returns:</b>

this

- This Promise
